name: VStream
description:
Ever wanted to play a casual 6 keys rhythm game with friends and healthy compete with friends? Well this is your chance, VStream is a game that takes user generated content and let's you play a fun 6k while having social support and sometimes special events! :) 

Join VStream now and play with us!

Features:

  • ocasional content updates that add new songs to the game!
  • updates to the game client that add new features!
  • add or follow your friends in-game to see their scores on the table!
  • cute and colorful characters!
  • real-time multiplayer support (beta)!
  • telegram bot integration to brag about your scores to your friends!
  • global server league points ranking

* To properly play some of the songs you need a keyboard that allows you to press at least 6 keys at once.

* This game is still on development stage, therefore there are no tutorials yet.
